channel.title: Posterous on zzamboni.org
channel.description: Recent content in Posterous on zzamboni.org

item.title: Website redesign and unification
item.description: There are still some rough edges, but by far the redesign and unification of zzamboni.org is done. With the same design you can now find my blogs (hosted by posterous.com), my project pages (hosted in github.com project repositories) and some static pages (hosted in my personal github.com pages repository, this includes the root, About and Code pages, as well as the static copy of my old blog BrT, which is the only one that retains its original design).
